com.google.calendar.interoperability.connectorplugin.base
Interface LdapUserFilter.Connector

All Superinterfaces:
Cloneable
Enclosing class:
LdapUserFilter
public static interface LdapUserFilter.Connector
extends Cloneable

This interface represents the connection logic for LDAP (replaced by mocks in unit tests). For concurrency reasons, all LDAP operations will always be executed on a clone of this object.

Method Summary
 LdapUserFilter.Connector clone()
          Creates a clone of this object -- this is necessary since the connectors are not guaranteed to be threadsafe
 void close()
          Closes the LDAP connection
 boolean login(String url, String authMethod, String user, String password)
          Log into LDAP using a given url, user and password
 Iterable<String> searchEmails(String searchBase, String filter)
          Performs an LDAP query on the users of a particular searchbase.
 

Method Detail

Log into LDAP using a given url, user and password

Returns:
true if the connection was successful

close

void close()
Closes the LDAP connection

searchEmails

Iterable<String> searchEmails(String searchBase,
                              String filter)
Performs an LDAP query on the users of a particular searchbase. May return null if the query failed due to some programming error or connection issues/

clone

LdapUserFilter.Connector clone()
Creates a clone of this object -- this is necessary since the connectors are not guaranteed to be threadsafe
